Kia Kanuta goes from washing dishes at Avondale RSA to winning Auckland’s outstanding chef award https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/young-maori-chef-named-aucklands-most-outstanding/6CBV3OSHYNCJJLSIUXW4UYBZTI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/young-maori-chef-named-aucklands-most-outstanding/6CBV3OSHYNCJJLSIUXW4UYBZTI/Kia Kanuta wins award at masquerade event. Sun, 02 Jun 2024 08:01:00 +0000 Auckland's most outstanding chef Kia Kanuta. Photo / Voices of Hope.
Levin ‘antisocial’ burnout meet: Police officers injured in 200-vehicle gathering, arrests made https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/levin-anti-social-burnout-meet-police-officers-injured-in-200-vehicle-gathering-arrests-made/R6EPSCB73NA73ESLBSDLIRFTGI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/levin-anti-social-burnout-meet-police-officers-injured-in-200-vehicle-gathering-arrests-made/R6EPSCB73NA73ESLBSDLIRFTGI/ Benjamin PlummerSix cars were impounded and two people were arrested. Sun, 02 Jun 2024 06:20:24 +0000 Police were pelted with rocks and bottles which injured two officers and damaged two Police vehicles during antisocial road user activity in Levin overnight across June 1-2 2024. Six cars were impounded, one person was arrested for disorderly behaviour, and another was arrested for obstruction. Photo / Police

Sun, 02 Jun 2024 04:21:22 +0000 Passengers on board a flight from Auckland to Dunedin ended up back where they started after the aircraft encountered "significant" turbulence. Photo / Brett Phibbs

New World MasterChef promo: Man fails in his bid for refund after missing out on cookware https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/new-world-masterchef-promo-man-fails-in-his-bid-for-refund-after-missing-out-on-cookware/7XVF5FVJHBDDPGJNIRQ3E3DP7Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/new-world-masterchef-promo-man-fails-in-his-bid-for-refund-after-missing-out-on-cookware/7XVF5FVJHBDDPGJNIRQ3E3DP7Q/ Jeremy WilkinsonThe supermarket chain ran out of free cookware, sparking outrage last year. Former Auckland teacher Murray Sakey sentenced over child sex images he claims provided inspiration for writing https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/former-auckland-teacher-murray-sakey-sentenced-over-child-sex-images-he-claims-provided-inspiration-for-writing/XRQIY5ARGJDTFIDVPVPMRTWFDU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/former-auckland-teacher-murray-sakey-sentenced-over-child-sex-images-he-claims-provided-inspiration-for-writing/XRQIY5ARGJDTFIDVPVPMRTWFDU/ Katie HarrisPolice found hundreds of objectionable photos and videos on his devices. Sun, 02 Jun 2024 00:30:03 +0000 Auckland man Murray Sakey, 74, pleaded guilty to having hundreds of child exploitation images. Sakey was sentenced on May 24, 2024, in the Waitakere District Court. Photo / Katie Harris
